text: Hello :wave:  is there any way of customising styles more in depth with <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/ui-extension-components|HubSpot ui extensions>?

We don't allow custom CSS, as the components are based on HubSpot's design systems, so that extensions look and feel like HubSpot. But depending on the needs, we can add customization options, to an extent.  Can you tell me what type of style customization are you looking for?

Understood.

The thing is it is pretty tied for complex designs.

For example the only way I have found to create a tabs component was with the use of buttons :thinkonk:

What are the customization options you mention?
For example would love also to be able to do dropdown like here:
